meanings.definition: In a morally unrestrained or indulgent manner.
meanings.sent1: She spent her money dissolutely on unnecessary things.
meanings.sent2: He lived dissolutely, ignoring all rules of decency.
meanings.sent3: The cat dissolutely knocked over the vase, looking mischievous.
meanings.sent4: The storm raged dissolutely, destroying everything in its path.
meanings.sent5: The child ate the candy dissolutely, with no regard for tomorrow.

meanings.sent1: The old man dissolutely wandered the streets, lost in memories.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends partied dissolutely all night long.
meanings.sent3: The clown danced dissolutely, entertaining the crowd with silly moves.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed dissolutely, carving its path through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted dissolutely, letting colors blend freely on the canvas.
